apache 2.0.63 2.2.9 version bug for METHOD='post' ENCTYPE='multipart/form-data'

when post upload file larger then 5GB use METHOD='post' ENCTYPE='multipart/form-data' to not exist file ,apache is not immediately report 404 file not found,but self process very long time , then long after repsond 404 error!
